meanings.definition: A square cap with three or four ridges or peaks worn by Roman Catholic clergy.
meanings.sent1: The priest wore his birettas during the special ceremony.
meanings.sent2: The birettas added a traditional touch to the outfit of the clergy.
meanings.sent3: The birettas looked like little square hats with peaks on top.
meanings.sent4: The birettas perched on their heads like miniature rooftops.
meanings.sent5: The colorful birettas stood out in the crowd of black robes.
